DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Use Cessation Chance To Speak Assessment Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A free text field to specify reason related to the chance to speak to anyone about the cessation of tobacco.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tobacco Use Cessation Chance To Speak
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The dried cured leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, used for smoking, chewing, or snuff.  Tobacco contains nicotine, a stimulant, and other biologically active ingredients having carcinogenic properties._A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something._A stopping._The possibility or likelihood that something will happen._To communicate using verbal language._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
